**How to setup your first react application?**

*Pre-requsities*
- A PC :-p
- Node JS

1. Install Node JS from https://nodejs.org/en/
2. After installing node.js
3. Create a folder "myfirst-react" application anywhere in your computer
4. Open terminal/command prompt, and navigate to the created folder (myfirst-react)
5. Type "npx create-react-app sample-react" and hit return
6. Now, the terminal will start to setup your first react application, Just give it sometime..
7. Once the installation is done, make sure there any no errors.
8. If installation is successful, please go to the sample-react folder using the command "cd sample-react"
9. Then type npm start to start your react app
10. You may be able to view the app at http://localhost:3000/ same as below

![](data:image/png;base64,)
